'''0.0.12a_02'''<ref>{{link |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20090529032503/http://notch.tumblr.com/post/110191862/0-0-12a-02-runs-smoother-than-ever|title=0.0.12a_02 runs smoother than ever. |website=The Word of Notch |date=May 20, 2009}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on May 19, 2009, at 23:20 UTC,<ref>{{link|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20200528035558/https://echelog.com/logs/browse/lwjgl/1242511200|title=lwjgl IRC logs|website=Echelog.com|date=May 20, 2009, UTC+2|quote=[01:19:56] <Notch_> 0.0.12a_02 is up with some performance fixes.}}</ref><ref>{{link|url=https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/history/files/May-15-to-June-03-2009/2009-05-19.155457-0400EDT.txt.~1~|title=TigIRC logs|date=May 19, 2009, UTC–4|website=Archive.org|quote=(19:22:46) notch: 0.0.12a_02 is up with some performance fixes.}}</ref><ref group="note">While some sources imply that this version was released on May 20, it was actually released at 23:20 UTC on May 19 (which is 01:20 on May 20, Sweden time).</ref> which improved performance.
